entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • unreliable codegen around vbroadcastss in .NET 8 release builds #96156
  • Add RIDs for Alpine 3.19 #96155
  • PInvokeTests.IEnumeratorTests.TestManagedToNative crash #96154
  • Restore the Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetHsotResolver package as a non-shipping package #96151
  • [Fuzzlyn] Assertion failed '!"Unexpected bbKind"' #96146
    9.0.0
  • [runtime-jit-experimental] Assertion failed 'loops->NumLoops() == 0' #96145
    9.0.0
  • UnixDomainSocketEndPoint no longer constructable on iOS (.NET 8) #96143
  • New SearchValues<string> API doesn't use vectorized equality comparison once it finds a candidate #96142
  • Building runtime on ARM64 uses x86 tools? #96141
    9.0.0
  • failure assigning ulong to decimal #96152
  • About additionalAssemblyPaths in .runtimeconfig.json #96133
  • [API Proposal]: Consider making all implementations of ILogger.BeginScope<TState>(TState) return a non-null value #96128
  • [API Proposal]: Parallel.ForEachAsync with Partitioner support #96126
  • `HasExited` throws Access Denied for the Idle process on Windows #96124
  • [RISCV] Mono RISC-V porting progress tracing #96117
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96116
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester.cmd #96114

Closed

  • Test failure Loader/classloader/MethodImpl/InternalMethodImplTest/InternalMethodImplTest.dll #96113
  • Runtime event for Monitor.Wait #94264
    Future
  • Native crash in `JIT.Regression` for `mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux x64 release` #74588
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Generalize check for cycles when finding loops #96153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96149
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96148
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` block kind when checking for loop exit #96147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96139
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix unhandled exception with no managed frames #96138
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix bug in label printing in disasm #96136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix JitOptRepeat around shared constants #96130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: remove bound check for negated ranges #96123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change Native AOT ThreadBuffer.m_threadId to OS thread id #96120
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Add a note on unoptimized IL to feature checks doc #96119
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Merged

  • Delete unused CORINFO_FLG_FIELD_PROTECTED #96144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96076
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix InternalMethodImplTest w/ R2R #96115
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Simplify AdditionalSharedFrameworkToInstallArguments in workloads-testing.targets #96107
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT ARM64-SVE2: Add IF_SVE_DQ_0A, IF_SVE_DR_1A, IF_SVE_DS_2A #95996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Update the bit field of encoding function names #96082
    arch-arm64-sve
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CX_4A group #95918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove outdated buildtriage.md doc #96127
    area-Meta
  • Use lowercase arm64 in CMakePresets.json #96111
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Extract `src/mono/browser` from `src/mono/wasm` #95940
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • [mono][jit] Optimize the experimental-gshared-mrgctx code #96104
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add dumpers for new loop data structures #96080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Clarify OS and Arch ownership #95972
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Browser.targets: Fix .dlls being deployed to `publish/` #96045
    area-Build-mono
  • New exception handling diagnostic fixes #96065
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • extract side-effects from op1 of GT_COMMA #96077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #96053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #96055
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement KMAC #96025
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add emitUnitTests.sh #96064
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • ReadAsStream/CopyTo should reset result/destination stream position #95827
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95870
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve the hash function used in the `InstMethodHashTable` #95285
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: runtime initialization workarounds #2359
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Publishing broken #2461

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Multi-threaded compiler #2293
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement finalization #2240
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Support dotnet.js #2434

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Upload internediate artifacts when isOfficialBuild = true #2466

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Enable JS interop #2440
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • PublishAot failed with LNK1181 error #37297

Updated

  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • `donet watch` fails on rebuilt with locked source generator dll (net8) #35607
  • Workload installation failed: microsoft.android.sdk.windows::34.0.64 is not found in NuGet feeds https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json" #37580
  • Replace DOS stub due to potential copyright issue #37550
  • [NETSDKE2E]Publishing blazorwasm project failed with AOT compilation = true with .net9 SDK #37524

PullRequests

Merged

  • wrap and handle cancellation exceptions in .NET Task #37055
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.2xx
  • Improve Container support for AOT publishing and targeting musl runtimes. #37054
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • don't use cookies to unblock CSRF workflows #37221
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Bump dockercredsprovider to pick up a bugfix #36707
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add missing --archiveoutputpath option to .NET Framework container tool task #36652
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Provide new default for runtime identifier Fixes #35575 #36848
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37543
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794

  • Extension lowering #7771
  • namespace internal access modifier #2497

PullRequests

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EditorConfig designer does not update when changes are applied by a code fix #71322
  • Analyzer interceptors CS9139 false positive when using mapped paths #71321
  • Remove and Sort Usings across solution #71316
  • Allow user to finish typing before displaying new inline diagnostic messages from Background Analysis #71314
  • Persist messages from running code analysis #71313
  • [feature request] Insight into what exceptions can reach a certain part of the code #71308
  • Minimize using extension methods #71306
  • Copy The method documentation on pull member up in Visual studio #71304
  • Parenthesizing an expression duplicates diagnostics #71303
  • Can not get compilation object for web aplications #71302
  • Interface constraints not used for generic interface covariance, leading to CS0266 #71301

Closed

  • Make code action's nested actions publicly accessible #71050
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34418.87 #71331
  • IDE0200 is not reported in .NET 8 but works in .NET 7 for injected dependencies #71300
  • Stack trace window should show virtual stack frame below for async code #71319
  • Intelisense, suggestion, and error context menu's overlap and interfere with each other #71318
  • Enable Message IDE0052 to detect native usage #71317
  • static analysis to detect refactoring regressions #71315
  • REQ: About "references" line over each class and property... #71312
  • One feature suggestion about Attributes in C# is whether Attributes should be given more capabilities #71311
  • Use the dictionary key to name the variable while implementing the "Use pattern matching" IDE0038 suggestion #71310
  • intellisense limited on enum's member for enum type member parameter #71309
  • Implicit range support via extension method #71307
  • Visual Studio 2022 Preview intellisense colors for overload completion is bad #71305

PullRequests

Created

  • SynthesizedReadOnlyListTypeSymbol.Create - Check for MissingMetadataTypeSymbol #71330
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Generate a package source mapping #71326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IOperation - drop synthesized conversion placed on top of params collections #71325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Install VSIX with integration tests in CI #71320
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Cleanup overload resolution code used in signature help #71329
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Make CodeAction.NestedActions public #71327
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • WIP #71142
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix simplify lambda expression with unrelated assignment in other method #71324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not checkout when running integration tests #71323
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Do not call Unsubst if it is not available due to argument processing #71282
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. Part 1/N. #71141
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement json serialization/deserialization for LSP json messages. Part 2/N #68990
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Allow collection expressions with `CreateCompilation` #71134
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Params Collections: Implement "Better function member" section of the proposal #71271
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Updated

  • [Inline Rename] Update the UI related to Copilot #71332
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Only apply one document info change for linked documents #71220
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix semicolon placement in statement-placement fixer #66610
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71274
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • API proposal for an IndentingStringBuilder. #71163
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Perform source gen out of proc (sync project cone) #70333
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, Backlog
  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Pass project info to the Razor extension in VS Code #70913
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Speed up integration test build by only building required dependencies #71289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Globalization for Server/Auto Resets After Initial Load #52885
  • Determine how to build aspnetcore's hosting bundle #52884
  • Perf regression: json, json #52883
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #52882
  • Request model binding with `FromQuery` properties `AsParameters` results in all properties being required. #52881
    9.0-preview1
  • EventCallbackFactory has wrong nullability annotations for all callback parameters. #52872
  • Post request does not render end state of components on SSR page #52871
    8.0.x
  • NET8: DefaultObjectPool<T>.Get() method returns null under multi-threads, seems not thread-safe with NET8 and throws exception, while no problem with NET7 #52873
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52870

Closed

  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plaintext #52862
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #52869
  • Blazor hosted webassembly NavigationManager NavigateTo causing client navigation instead of silent history.pushState #52256
  • [Blazor] In static render mode, scripts are not loaded onto the page after navigation. #51175
    Planning: WebUI
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo not navigating in specific case (.NET 8 RC2) #51288
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Client diffing bug #50877
    Planning: WebUI
  • A11y_.NETCore_ASP.NETCore_Counter_Counter Section_Name role value: The purpose of the "click me" button is not clear from the provided label #51152
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor WASM, SSR and CDNs #46734
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor WASM: Javascript/css not compressing when using Brotli web.config #51166
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Expose the functionality in internal EndpointHtmlRenderer for integrating frameworks #51148
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor crash in render diff internals #51267
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Analyzer] Verify Blazor route type constraints are specified with all lower-case letters #44252
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor wasm AuthorizeView's NotAuthorized section executes before the authentication state returns #30765
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor cannot find entrypoint when a library from another folder is referenced. #30594
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Server and CkEditor problem #52855
  • Shadow copying for ASP.NET Core 8 seems to be broken #52525
  • Certificate need to save manually in local to run the application #52679

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve debug views of dictionaries #52867
    area-networking

Merged

  • [Dependency update] Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.23618.1 #52877
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Remove InvariantGlobalization in templates (#52428) #52461
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52823
    area-blazor
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • [release/8.0] Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52830
    area-identity, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Populate the ValidIssuer and the ValidAudience properties of the JwtBearerOptions.TokenValidationParameters. #52821
    area-auth, community-contribution, area-security
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [blazor][wasm] Remove legacy interop #52732
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 9 Planning
  • [release/8.0] Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52790
    Servicing-approved, area-hosting, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] Clear Button on Entry when RTL is still broken #19481
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [iOS] ScrollView height not changing after items are hidden #19479
  • [iOS] RadioButton with custom ContentTemplate in ResourceDictionary does not respond to taps #19478
  • [Android] The measure and arrange methods are not being called in custom layout with ContentView #19471
  • [iOS] [MacCatalyst] Entry Text color not updated initially when updating text from code behind in .NET MAUI #19470
    Backlog
  • MAUI App bundle size is too large on release mode (second attempt) #19469
  • NET Maui app with none shell navigation bug #19480

Closed

  • API's for accessing drives(File System), Microphone, Camera, add or remove software's #19477
  • PlatformNotSupported exception on iOS Release build from DevOps pipeline #16025
  • Contacts API namespace conflicts on MacCatalyst and iOS #7421
    Backlog
  • View Following Cursor via PoitnerGesture Will Flicker In AbsoluteLayout #19330
    Backlog
  • App doesn't run App.xaml.cs after killing ForegroundService and reopening it #19453
  • [Windows] Unable to change color of SearchBar bottom line and selected flyout menu #19426
  • FontFamily is Not Recognized in UnPackaged WinUI App #19457
    Backlog
  • Views are not vertically centre when layout vertical layout option is set to centre #19464
  • Selected Visual States no longer work correctly #11238
    Backlog
  • [testing] Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18740
    .NET 8 SR2
  • XamlC ignores isError option in ObsoleteAttribute #18704
  • NSInvalidArgumentException in setCornerCurve #19467

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Clear Button size calculation #19482
  • [ci] Move to new compliance task #19475
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix TableView rendering on Android #19473
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #19472
    area/essentials 🍞

Merged

  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • XamlC WarnAsErrors. #19337
    area/Xaml </>

Updated

  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.3 #19394
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Devices.Sensors.Location: rework argument handling in constructors #19459
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D8 #18760
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added appium UITest for FlyoutNavigationBetweenItemsWithNavigationStacks #19444
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add design time converters #19301
    area/Xaml </>
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • Do not use underscores in the ApplicationId #19377
    area/templates 📄
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19454
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use Fluent Api using Many to many with backingfield without extra class #32639
  • Updating an indexed field is case-insensitive #32638
  • Can no longer client-evaluate query with projection involving non-primitive list #32634

Closed

  • Entity Framework Core does not recognize Id property as primary key #32632
  • Plan for Entity Framework Core 8 (EF8) #29853
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't keep join table around because a ForeignKeyAttribute used to reference it #32637

Updated

  • Additional testing transforming the database model to the IModel that will then be used for scaffolding #32631

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Wrong VS version on .NET 8.0.100 SDK installer #17999

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • VS 2022 Translation Error 机器学习模型 #17220

PullRequests

Merged

  • [VMR] Initial attempt at a Mac VMR build #17934
  • Remove Arcade net9.0 workarounds #17987
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17986
